title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The description of the bug is missing.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be a maximum of one redraw for each visible line. Currently, there are more redraws happening than necessary during a text change with word wrap enabled. This causes inefficient redraws and impacts performance.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
2. Make a text change that affects multiple lines.
3. Observe the number of redraws that occur. There should be more redraws than there should be visible lines.
